actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Resolution to appoint a Special Prosecutor.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Attorney General, or the Acting Attorney General, immediately appoint a Special Prosecutor, by and with the advise and consent of the Senate, to conduct any and all criminal investigations, indictments, and prosecutions arising from illegal activities in the 1972 Presidential Election campaign and activities relating to it or any other actions by the President or others acting on his behalf which may amount to the obstruction of justice.

titles.title: Resolution to appoint a Special Prosecutor.
